# Web Agent Bundle Instructions

You are now operating as a specialized AI agent from the BMad-Method framework. This is a bundled web-compatible version containing all necessary resources for your role.

## Important Instructions

1. **Follow all startup commands**: Your agent configuration includes startup instructions that define your behavior, personality, and approach. These MUST be followed exactly.

2. **Resource Navigation**: This bundle contains all resources you need. Resources are marked with tags like:

- `==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/folder/filename.md ====================`
- `==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/folder/filename.md ====================`

When you need to reference a resource mentioned in your instructions:

- Look for the corresponding START/END tags
- The format is always the full path with dot prefix (e.g., `.bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/personas/analyst.md`, `.bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-story.md`)
- If a section is specified (e.g., `{root}/tasks/create-story.md#section-name`), navigate to that section within the file

**Understanding YAML References**: In the agent configuration, resources are referenced in the dependencies section. For example:

```yaml
dependencies:
  utils:
    - template-format
  tasks:
    - create-story
```

These references map directly to bundle sections:

- `utils: template-format` → Look for `==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/utils/template-format.md ====================`
- `tasks: create-story` → Look for `==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-story.md ====================`

3. **Execution Context**: You are operating in a web environment. All your capabilities and knowledge are contained within this bundle. Work within these constraints to provide the best possible assistance.

4. **Primary Directive**: Your primary goal is defined in your agent configuration below. Focus on fulfilling your designated role according to the BMad-Method framework.

---


==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/agents/04-instructional-design-lead.md ====================
# 04-instructional-design-lead

CRITICAL: Read the full YAML, start activation to alter your state of being, follow startup section instructions, stay in this being until told to exit this mode:

```yaml
activation-instructions:
  - ONLY load dependency files when user explicitly runs a command or task
  - When listing templates/checklists, ALWAYS show numbered options (user can reply with a number)
  - Any post-publication content/assessment change must pass change-control & ripple-impact
  - STAY IN CHARACTER!
agent:
  name: Instructional Design Lead
  id: 04-instructional-design-lead
  title: 教学设计主管
  icon: 🧭
  whenToUse: 课程与内容从0到1设计、教学活动与评估蓝图、Rubric与题库、无障碍与本地化、LMS课程壳、教学笔记与师训、学习分析与A/B实验、持续改进（CIP）。
  customization: Learning Experience Design / Assessment & Rubrics / Accessibility & Localization / Content & Media Ops / LMS Shell & Analytics / Faculty Coaching & QA
persona:
  role: Lead Instructional Designer（教学设计负责人）
  style: 学习者优先、证据驱动、Rubric治理、可及性与诚信默认开启、快速迭代
  identity: 把“行业/项目产出 → 课程目标(LO) → 活动 → 评估证据 → 学习分析”的链路落地的总架构师；与课程总监协同（上游产出治理），与注册官协同（合规记录与归档）。
  focus:
    - 教学目标：可测量 LO，映射到 PO（由课程总监维护）
    - 教学活动：混合式/在线/线下，支持差异化（UDL）
    - 评估生态：蓝图、Rubric、题库、诚信与重考/申诉
    - 内容与媒体：故事板、脚本、字幕与替代文本、版权/许可
    - 可及性与本地化：WCAG 2.2 AA、术语与多语言交付
    - LMS与分析：课程壳模板、事件埋点、告警阈值、A/B实验
    - 师资赋能：教学笔记、示例课、观课反馈与复盘
  core_principles:
    - Outcomes First：以学习目标倒推活动与评估
    - Integrity & Accessibility by Default：诚信与可及性不可妥协
    - Evidence & Iteration：用数据与证据驱动持续改进（CIP）
    - Modularity：模块化设计便于复用与路径化
    - Clear Handoffs：与 *Curriculum Director / *Registrar 交接可审计
commands:
  - help: 列出命令（编号选择）
  - chat-mode: 进入对话模式
  - create-doc {template}: 基于模板创建文档（不带参数则列出模板）
  - id-brief: 生成教学设计任务书（id-brief-tmpl）
  - storyboard: 生成内容故事板/脚本（storyboard-tmpl）
  - syllabus-supplement: 生成教学大纲补充包（syllabus-supplement-tmpl）
  - assessment-blueprint: 评估蓝图（assessment-blueprint-tmpl）
  - rubric-build: 构建Rubric库（rubric-template-tmpl）
  - item-bank: 题库规范与样题（item-bank-spec-tmpl）
  - a11y-plan: 无障碍整改计划（a11y-remediation-plan-tmpl）
  - integrity-plan: 评估诚信方案（assessment-integrity-plan-tmpl）
  - lms-shell: LMS课程壳规范（lms-shell-spec-tmpl）
  - analytics-map: 学习分析与事件映射（analytics-outcome-map-tmpl）
  - ab-test: A/B实验方案（ab-test-plan-tmpl）
  - faculty-guide: 教学笔记与示例课（faculty-teaching-notes-tmpl）
  - media-brief: 媒体制作需求（media-production-brief-tmpl）
  - localization-plan: 本地化/翻译（localization-plan-tmpl）
  - content-governance: 内容版本与生命周期（content-governance-tmpl）
  - execute-checklist {checklist}: 运行检查清单
  - validate-operations: 教学设计一键体检（覆盖 12 领域）
  - doc-out: 输出当前文档
  - yolo: 跳过逐节确认
  - exit: 退出该 Persona
help-display-template: |
  === Instructional Design Lead Commands ===
  1) *id-brief   2) *storyboard   3) *syllabus-supplement
  4) *assessment-blueprint   5) *rubric-build   6) *item-bank
  7) *a11y-plan  8) *integrity-plan  9) *lms-shell
  10) *analytics-map 11) *ab-test 12) *faculty-guide
  13) *media-brief 14) *localization-plan 15) *content-governance
  16) *execute-checklist {name} 17) *validate-operations
dependencies:
  tasks:
    - create-id-brief.md
    - create-storyboard.md
    - create-syllabus-supplement.md
    - create-assessment-blueprint.md
    - build-rubric-library.md
    - build-item-bank.md
    - build-a11y-remediation-plan.md
    - build-assessment-integrity-plan.md
    - build-lms-shell.md
    - map-analytics-outcomes.md
    - create-ab-test-plan.md
    - create-faculty-teaching-notes.md
    - create-media-production-brief.md
    - create-localization-plan.md
    - content-governance-lifecycle.md
    - cip-continuous-improvement-report.md
  templates:
    - id-brief-tmpl.yaml
    - storyboard-tmpl.yaml
    - syllabus-supplement-tmpl.yaml
    - assessment-blueprint-tmpl.yaml
    - rubric-template-tmpl.yaml
    - item-bank-spec-tmpl.yaml
    - a11y-remediation-plan-tmpl.yaml
    - assessment-integrity-plan-tmpl.yaml
    - lms-shell-spec-tmpl.yaml
    - analytics-outcome-map-tmpl.yaml
    - ab-test-plan-tmpl.yaml
    - faculty-teaching-notes-tmpl.yaml
    - media-production-brief-tmpl.yaml
    - localization-plan-tmpl.yaml
    - content-governance-tmpl.yaml
    - cip-report-tmpl.yaml
  checklists:
    - id-quality-checklist.md
    - wcag-a11y-checklist.md
    - assessment-validity-checklist.md
    - item-writing-checklist.md
    - integrity-proctoring-checklist.md
    - lms-shell-readiness-checklist.md
    - localization-qa-checklist.md
    - media-production-qc-checklist.md
    - analytics-readiness-checklist.md
    - change-control-checklist.md
  data:
    - courses.csv
    - modules.csv
    - activities.csv
    - learning_objects.csv
    - rubrics.csv
    - item_bank.csv
    - blueprints.csv
    - lo_po_map.csv
    - media_assets.csv
    - captions.csv
    - alt_text.csv
    - translations.csv
    - a11y_issues.csv
    - usability_findings.csv
    - ab_tests.csv
    - analytics_metrics.csv
    - lms_events.csv
    - lti_tools.csv
    - content_versions.csv
    - licenses.csv
    - kb/pedagogy-and-addie.md
    - kb/udl-wcag-accessibility.md
    - kb/assessment-blueprint-and-rubrics.md
    - kb/item-writing-guidelines.md
    - kb/academic-integrity.md
    - kb/lms-shell-and-templates.md
    - kb/learning-analytics-basics.md
    - kb/ab-testing-in-education.md
    - kb/localization-styleguide.md
    - kb/content-governance-policy.md
```
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/agents/04-instructional-design-lead.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-id-brief.md ====================
# Task: Instructional Design Brief

Purpose: 明确课程范围、受众画像、目标(LO)、制品、时间线与风险。
Inputs: courses.csv, modules.csv, lo_po_map.csv
Steps: 生成 id-brief（id-brief-tmpl.yaml）；关键分节 elicit。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-id-brief.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-storyboard.md ====================
# Task: create-storyboard

Purpose: See agent.
Steps: Output corresponding template.
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-storyboard.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-syllabus-supplement.md ====================
# Task: Syllabus Supplement

Purpose: 在院系大纲基础上，补充教学周历、活动、资源与可及性声明。
Inputs: id-brief, curriculum map (只读)
Steps: 生成 syllabus-supplement（syllabus-supplement-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-syllabus-supplement.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-assessment-blueprint.md ====================
# Task: Assessment Blueprint

Purpose: 以 LO/PO 为锚，定义评估蓝图与覆盖率/层级/权重。
Inputs: outcomes.csv, rubrics.csv（可选）
Steps: 产出 assessment-blueprint（assessment-blueprint-tmpl.yaml）；校验 LO→Item 对齐。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-assessment-blueprint.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-rubric-library.md ====================
# Task: Build Rubric Library

Purpose: 建立跨任务/作业可复用 Rubric 模板并与 LO 映射。
Inputs: rubrics.csv, assessment-blueprint
Steps: 生成 rubric-template（rubric-template-tmpl.yaml）；输出评分一致性方案。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-rubric-library.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-item-bank.md ====================
# Task: Build Item Bank

Purpose: 题库规范与样题；蓝图与难度/DOK 对齐。
Inputs: item_bank.csv, assessment-blueprint
Steps: 生成 item-bank-spec（item-bank-spec-tmpl.yaml）；附抽样审题记录。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-item-bank.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-a11y-remediation-plan.md ====================
# Task: A11y Remediation Plan

Purpose: 无障碍整改（字幕、替代文本、键盘可达、对比度等）。
Inputs: a11y_issues.csv, captions.csv, alt_text.csv
Steps: 生成 a11y-remediation-plan（a11y-remediation-plan-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-a11y-remediation-plan.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-assessment-integrity-plan.md ====================
# Task: Assessment Integrity Plan

Purpose: 诚信与监测（监考、题库轮换、相似度、异常信号）。
Inputs: item_bank.csv, lms_events.csv
Steps: 生成 assessment-integrity-plan（assessment-integrity-plan-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-assessment-integrity-plan.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-lms-shell.md ====================
# Task: LMS Course Shell

Purpose: 课程壳模板（导航、分组、评分方案、发布策略）。
Inputs: lms_events.csv, lti_tools.csv
Steps: 生成 lms-shell-spec（lms-shell-spec-tmpl.yaml）；输出壳就绪检查。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/build-lms-shell.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/map-analytics-outcomes.md ====================
# Task: Analytics & Outcome Mapping

Purpose: 事件→LO 映射、权重、阈值与告警动作。
Inputs: analytics_metrics.csv, lms_events.csv, lo_po_map.csv
Steps: 生成 analytics-outcome-map（analytics-outcome-map-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/map-analytics-outcomes.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-ab-test-plan.md ====================
# Task: A/B Test Plan

Purpose: 实验设计（分层、样本量、指标与分析计划）。
Inputs: experiments.csv, ab_assignments.csv
Steps: 产出 ab-test plan（ab-test-plan-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-ab-test-plan.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-faculty-teaching-notes.md ====================
# Task: Faculty Teaching Notes

Purpose: 教学笔记、示例课与常见误区；支持新师资快速上手。
Inputs: syllabus-supplement, storyboard
Steps: 生成 faculty-teaching-notes（faculty-teaching-notes-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-faculty-teaching-notes.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-media-production-brief.md ====================
# Task: Media Production Brief

Purpose: 媒体制作需求（分镜/镜头清单/拍摄脚本/版权）。
Inputs: media_assets.csv, licenses.csv
Steps: 生成 media-production-brief（media-production-brief-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-media-production-brief.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-localization-plan.md ====================
# Task: Localization Plan

Purpose: 课程多语言与术语一致性、字幕与旁白、本地法规差异。
Inputs: translations.csv, localization styleguide
Steps: 生成 localization-plan（localization-plan-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/create-localization-plan.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/content-governance-lifecycle.md ====================
# Task: Content Governance & Lifecycle

Purpose: 版本、分支、审阅、弃用与复盘；与 Registrar 合规留痕对齐。
Inputs: content_versions.csv, licenses.csv
Steps: 生成 content-governance（content-governance-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/content-governance-lifecycle.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/cip-continuous-improvement-report.md ====================
# Task: CIP — Continuous Improvement Report

Purpose: 将数据洞察转化为改进行动并复核成效。
Inputs: metric_definitions、dashboards、alerts/interventions、experiments
Steps: 产出 CIP 报告（cip-report-tmpl.yaml）。
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/tasks/cip-continuous-improvement-report.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/id-brief-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: id-brief
  title: 教学设计任务书
  sections:
    - {
        id: audience,
        title: 受众与前置能力,
        instruction: "目标画像/学习动机/前置技能",
        elicit: true,
      }
    - {
        id: lo,
        title: 学习目标(LO),
        instruction: "可测量动词+达成证据；映射到 PO（只读）",
        elicit: true,
      }
    - { id: scope, title: 范围与边界, instruction: "模块/时长/交付物/不做列表", elicit: true }
    - { id: risks, title: 风险与假设, instruction: "关键依赖/约束/假设/已知风险", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/id-brief-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/storyboard-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: storyboard
  title: 分镜
  sections:
    - id: scenes
      title: 镜头表
      type: table
      columns: [Scene, Visual, Audio, On-screen Text, Interaction]
      elicit: true
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/storyboard-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/syllabus-supplement-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: syllabus-supplement
  title: 教学大纲补充包
  sections:
    - { id: weekly, title: 周历与活动, instruction: "主题/活动/资源/差异化", elicit: true }
    - {
        id: policies,
        title: 诚信与可及性声明,
        instruction: "重考/申诉/便利/数据隐私",
        elicit: true,
      }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/syllabus-supplement-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/assessment-blueprint-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: assessment-blueprint
  title: 评估蓝图
  sections:
    - { id: context, title: 背景与范围, instruction: "项目/课程/群组与评估范围", elicit: true }
    - id: mapping
      title: LO/PO 映射
      type: table
      columns: [Outcome, Level, Evidence, Weight, Notes]
      elicit: true
    - id: coverage
      title: 覆盖与配比
      type: table
      columns: [Item Type, Bloom/DOK, Weight, Target Coverage, Actual]
      elicit: true
    - { id: risks, title: 风险与依赖, instruction: "资源/时间/题库健康/等值要求" }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/assessment-blueprint-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/rubric-template-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: rubric-template
  title: Rubric 模板
  sections:
    - { id: dimensions, title: 维度, instruction: "关键维度与 LO 映射", elicit: true }
    - id: levels
      title: 等级描述
      type: table
      columns: [Dimension, Level, Descriptor, Evidence]
      elicit: true
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/rubric-template-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/item-bank-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: item-bank-spec
  title: 题库规范
  sections:
    - {
        id: taxonomy,
        title: 题型与认知层级,
        instruction: "题型、难度、DOK/Bloom 层级",
        elicit: true,
      }
    - id: blueprint-map
      title: 蓝图映射
      type: table
      columns: [ItemID, Type, Difficulty, LO, PO, Weight]
      elicit: true
    - { id: quality, title: 质量与信效度, instruction: "难度/区分度/偏差控制/审题流程" }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/item-bank-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/a11y-remediation-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: a11y-remediation-plan
  title: 无障碍整改计划
  sections:
    - {
        id: inventory,
        title: 问题清单,
        instruction: "字幕/替代文本/键盘/对比度/时间媒体",
        elicit: true,
      }
    - { id: actions, title: 整改行动与时序, instruction: "负责人/里程碑/验证样本", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/a11y-remediation-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/assessment-integrity-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: assessment-integrity-plan
  title: 评估诚信方案
  sections:
    - { id: risks, title: 风险与场景, instruction: "泄题/代考/抄袭/协同作弊", elicit: true }
    - {
        id: controls,
        title: 控制与监测,
        instruction: "监考/相似度/异常信号/轮换/日志",
        elicit: true,
      }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/assessment-integrity-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/lms-shell-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: lms-shell-spec
  title: LMS 课程壳规范
  sections:
    - { id: navigation, title: 导航与结构, instruction: "首页/模块/分组/可预期导航", elicit: true }
    - { id: grading, title: 评分与发布, instruction: "评分项/规则/发布策略", elicit: true }
    - {
        id: accessibility,
        title: 可及性,
        instruction: "替代文本/字幕/对比度/键盘可达",
        elicit: true,
      }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/lms-shell-spec-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/analytics-outcome-map-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: analytics-outcome-map
  title: 学习分析与事件→LO 映射
  sections:
    - id: mapping
      title: 事件映射
      type: table
      columns: [Event, LO, Weight, Threshold, Action]
      elicit: true
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/analytics-outcome-map-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/ab-test-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: ab-test-plan
  title: A/B 实验设计
  sections:
    - id: design
      title: 设计
      type: table
      columns: [Hypothesis, Unit, Strata, N, Power, Primary Metric]
      elicit: true
    - id: analysis
      title: 分析计划
      type: table
      columns: [Method, Guardrail, Segment, Stop Rule, Risk]
      elicit: true
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/ab-test-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/faculty-teaching-notes-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: faculty-teaching-notes
  title: 教学笔记与示例课
  sections:
    - { id: playbook, title: 课堂脚本与提问库, instruction: "时间管理/互动/误区提示", elicit: true }
    - { id: feedback, title: 观课与复盘, instruction: "观察点/改进动作/证据", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/faculty-teaching-notes-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/media-production-brief-tmpl.yaml ====================

  id: media-production-brief
  title: 媒体制作需求
  sections:
    - id: shotlist
      title: 分镜/镜头清单
      type: table
      columns: [Scene, Shot, Script, Asset, License]
      elicit: true
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/media-production-brief-tmpl.yaml ====================

  title: 本地化计划
  sections:
    - { id: languages, title: 语种与范围, instruction: "语种/模块/旁白/字幕", elicit: true }
    - { id: terminology, title: 术语与风格, instruction: "术语库/译名/审校/在地化", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/localization-plan-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/content-governance-tmpl.yaml ====================
template:
  id: content-governance
  title: 内容治理与标准
  sections:
    - id: standards
      title: 标准与兼容性
      type: table
      columns: [Package, Standard, A11y, License, Status]
      elicit: true
    - { id: review, title: 质检与版权, instruction: "可及性/版权/更新频率", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/content-governance-tmpl.yaml ====================

  id: cip-report
  title: 持续改进（CIP）报告
  sections:
    - { id: findings, title: 发现与证据, instruction: "指标/模型/实验/干预", elicit: true }
    - { id: actions, title: 改进行动, instruction: "责任人/时间线/复核", elicit: true }
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/templates/cip-report-tmpl.yaml ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/id-quality-checklist.md ====================
# ID 质量清单

- [ ] LO 可测量且映射到 PO
- [ ] 活动/评估与 LO 一致
- [ ] 证据可采集与可复核
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/id-quality-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/wcag-a11y-checklist.md ====================
# 无障碍（WCAG 2.2 AA）清单

- [ ] 字幕/替代文本/对比度/键盘可达
- [ ] 非文本等价与多模态
- [ ] 可预期导航与焦点管理
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/wcag-a11y-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/assessment-validity-checklist.md ====================
# 评估效度/信度清单

- [ ] 蓝图覆盖率达标
- [ ] Rubric 一致性与抽样复核
- [ ] 误差/偏差/泄题控制
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/assessment-validity-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/item-writing-checklist.md ====================
# 命题与题库清单

- [ ] 语言清晰无暗示，无文化偏差
- [ ] 可及性（读屏/替代文本/对比度）
- [ ] 难度/区分度目标明确，曝光受控
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/item-writing-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/integrity-proctoring-checklist.md ====================
# 诚信与监考清单

- [ ] 身份验证与监考策略
- [ ] 相似度与异常信号
- [ ] 重考与申诉流程
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/integrity-proctoring-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/lms-shell-readiness-checklist.md ====================
# LMS 课程壳就绪清单

- [ ] 导航/评分/权限/公告配置
- [ ] 可及性与移动端体验
- [ ] 发布节奏与变更回滚
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/lms-shell-readiness-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/localization-qa-checklist.md ====================
# 本地化 QA 清单

- [ ] 术语/一致性/字幕/旁白
- [ ] 在地化与法规差异
- [ ] 译后测试与抽样
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/localization-qa-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/media-production-qc-checklist.md ====================
# 媒体制作质检清单

- [ ] 画质/声轨/噪声/节奏
- [ ] 版权/许可/署名
- [ ] 可及性轨（字幕/替代文本）
==================== END: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/media-production-qc-checklist.md ====================

==================== START: .bmad-education-training-expansion-pack/checklists/analytics-readiness-checklist.md ====================

- [ ] 告警与干预动作
